text:
Hello everyone.

I am trying to customize the default HubSpot module for *blog comments* but all it has inside is:

```{% blog_comments "blog_comments" limit=10000 %}```
How can I customize the divs, clasess and css of the module? More importantly, how can I know which variables prints the name, email and comment of the visitor that wrote it.

I want to customize the look of the comments left on a blog post.

Got the solution!

For anyone interested, here is the link to the solution I found useful: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Customize-the-blog-comment-module/m-p/762707#M33056>
